jsonContent: {"slides":[{"title":"Introducing the Ultimate Air Fryer","description":"Discover the powerful 1800W air fryer with a spacious 12-litre capacity, perfect for family-sized meals and versatile cooking options.","suggested_image":"Use Image 2: edited-1754418100427-1.png"},{"title":"Effortless Cooking with One-Touch Control","description":"Experience the convenience of our digital, one-touch control panel that simplifies cooking with just a press of a button.","suggested_image":"Use Image 3: edited-step-3-1753980167340.png"},{"title":"Smart Cooking Programs for Every Meal","description":"Enjoy 8 presets designed to cook fries, meat, fish, shrimp, chicken, bake, rotisserie, and dehydrate effortlessly.","suggested_image":"Use Image 1: edited-step-2-1754418266121.png"},{"title":"Sleek Black Design for Modern Kitchens","description":"Our air fryer's elegant black finish complements any kitchen decor, adding a touch of sophistication.","suggested_image":"Use Image 4: 2-logo-1753979614765-2.png"},{"title":"Complete Cooking Accessories Included","description":"Comes with 3 wire racks, a drip tray, protective cover, skewer rack, rotisserie forks, shaft, and fetch tool for versatile cooking.","suggested_image":"Use Image 1: edited-step-2-1754418266121.png"},{"title":"Built to Last with 2-Year Warranty","description":"Invest with confidence in our durable air fryer, backed by a 2-year warranty for peace of mind."}]}
author: API Test User
